                            <div class="body-title">
                              <span class="title">투자자 유형별 투자한도(2018.03.08 업데이트)</span>
                              <span class="created">2017-05-12</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="body-contents">
                              <h4><span style="font-size: 17px;"><!-- react-text: 690 -->금융감독원의 P2P대출 가이드라인이 개정됨에 따라 펀디드에서는 2018년 3월 9일부터 일반 투자자의 투자한도가 변경됩니다. <!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </h4>
                              <h4><span style="font-size: 17px;"><!-- react-text: 693 -->총 투자한도는 기존 1천만원에서 2천만원으로 상향되며, 부동산 상품 투자한도는 1천만원, 동일 차주 상품 투자한도는 5백만원입니다.<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </h4>
                              <div><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><br></span></span>
                              </div>
                              <div><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 701 -->유형별 투자한도<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 703 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></span>
                              </div>
                              <div><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 706 -->1<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 708 -->개의<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 710 -->&nbsp;P2P<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 711 -->업체 기준으로 유형별 투자한도가 적용되며<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 713 -->,&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 714 -->이는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US" style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 716 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 719 -->투자원금 잔액<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 721 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></span><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 723 -->기준입니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 725 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 726 -->한도내에서 상환받은 금액을 재투자하실 수 있습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 728 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span></span></span><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><br></span></span></span><br>
                              </div>

                              </h5>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 834 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 836 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><br>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 840 -->가이드라인 개정에 따라 일반 투자자의 투자 한도가 상향되었습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 842 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 846 -->개인으로 회원가입을 하면 자동적으로<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 848 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 850 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 851 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 853 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 854 -->일반 개인투자자는<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 857 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 858 -->펀디드 상품 전체에 대해서는 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 860 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 861 -->천만 원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 863 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 864 -->부동산 상품에 대해서는 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 866 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 867 -->천만 원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 869 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 870 -->동일대출자 상품에 대해서는 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 872 --> 5<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 873 -->백만 원 투자 가능합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 875 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 877 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 878 -->이 이상으로 투자하기 위해서는 추가<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 880 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 881 -->요건을 갖추고 증빙서류를 펀디드에 제출하면 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 883 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 888 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 892 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 897 -->개인으로 회원가입 후 증빙서류를 제출하면<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 899 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 901 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 902 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 904 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 908 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자는 펀디드를 통해 대출받는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 910 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 912 -->동일 대출자에 대해<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 914 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 915 -->천만원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 917 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 918 -->펀디드 상품 전체에 대해서는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 920 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 921 -->최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 923 --> 4<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 924 -->천만원까지<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 926 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 927 -->투자원금 잔액 기준<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 929 -->) <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 930 -->투자 가능<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 931 -->합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 933 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 938 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 941 -->요건은 두 가지 중<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 944 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></b></span><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 947 -->하나 이상<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 949 -->을 충족하면 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 951 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 955 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 957 -->이자<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 959 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 960 -->배당소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 962 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 963 -->천만 원 초과 or 2)<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 965 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 967 -->사업<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 969 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 970 -->근로소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 972 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 973 -->억 원 초과<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 977 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 980 -->증빙서류<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 982 --> :&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 985 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 988 -->직전과세기간<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 990 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 991 -->종합소득세 과세표준 확정신고서<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 993 --> + <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 994 -->종합소득세 신고서 접수증<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 996 -->) &nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 998 -->or<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1000 -->&nbsp;(<!-- /react-text --></span><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1003 -->근로소득 원천징수영수증<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1005 -->)<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1010 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1012 -->이자<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1014 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1015 -->배당소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1017 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1018 -->천만원 초과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1020 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 1022 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 1024 -->종합소득 과세표준 확정신고서의<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1026 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1027 -->이자소득금액과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1029 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1030 -->배당소득금액의 합 기준<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1032 -->)<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1036 -->2) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1038 -->사업소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1040 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1041 -->억원 초과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1043 --> (<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1044 -->종합소득 과세표준 확정신고서의 사업소득명세서<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1046 --> - <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1047 -->소득금액 기준<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1049 -->)<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1053 -->3) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1055 -->근로소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1057 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1058 -->억원 초과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1060 --> (<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1061 -->근로소득 원천징수영수증의 근로소득금액 기준<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1063 -->)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 1068 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1071 -->종합소득세 신고서 발급은<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1073 --> 1) <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1074 -->국세청 홈택스 홈페이지<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1076 --> 2)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1077 -->세무대리인을 통해서 할 수 있습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1079 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US"><a href="https://www.hometax.go.kr/" target="_blank"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1086 -->국세청<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1089 --> <!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1092 -->홈택스<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1095 --> <!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1098 -->바로가기<!-- /react-text --></span></span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1100 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1104 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1106 -->신고<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1108 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1109 -->납부<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1111 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1112 -->세금신고<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1114 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1115 -->종합소득세<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1117 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1118 -->신고내역<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1120 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1121 -->신고서보기<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1123 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1124 -->종합소득세 과세표준 확정신고서 출력<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1126 -->)<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 1131 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1135 -->개인 전문투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1140 -->개인으로 회원가입 후 증빙서류를 제출하면<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1142 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 1144 -->개인 전문투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 1145 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1147 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1148 -->개인 전문투자자는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1150 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 1152 -->금액 제한 없이 펀디드 상품에 자유롭게 투자 가능<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 1153 -->합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1155 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 1160 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1163 -->금융투자협회 지정 전문투자자는 다음의<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1165 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1168 -->세 가지 요건 모두<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1170 -->를 충족해야 합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1172 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1176 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1178 -->신청일 직전 영업일 기준 금융투자상품 잔고<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1180 --> 5<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1181 -->억 원 이상<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1186 -->2) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1188 -->직전 년도의 연소득이<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1190 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1191 -->억 원 이상이거나 제출일 직전 영업일 기준 재산가액<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1193 --> 10<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1194 -->억 원 이상<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1199 -->3) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1201 -->금융투자회사에서 계좌를 개설한 날로부터<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1203 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1204 -->년 이상 경과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 1210 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1213 -->증빙서류<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1215 --> :&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 1218 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1221 -->금융투자협회 전문투자자 확인증<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1223 -->)<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1232 -->신청은<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1234 --> <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 굴림; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1236 -->금융투자협회<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1246 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.kofia.or.kr/wpge/m_175/sub041201.do" target="_blank"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 굴림; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1252 -->금융투자협회<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1255 --> <!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 굴림; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1258 -->바로가기<!-- /react-text --></span></span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1260 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><br>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1266 -->법인 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1269 -->법인회원 가입 후 증빙서류를 제출하면<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1271 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 1273 -->법인투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 1274 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1276 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1277 -->법인투자자는<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1280 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1281 -->금액 제한 없이 펀디드 상품에 자유롭게 투자 가능<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 1282 -->합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1284 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 1289 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1292 -->증빙서류<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1297 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1299 -->사업자등록증 및 법인통장 사본<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1302 -->2)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 1304 -->법인인감증명서<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1309 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 1311 -->담당자 서류<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 1313 -->&nbsp;:&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 1315 -->재직증명서<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 1317 -->,&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 1319 -->위임장<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 1321 -->,&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 1323 -->신분증 사본<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 1325 -->&nbsp;(<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 1327 -->주민등록번호 뒷자리 제거<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);                               </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1332 -->4)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1334 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1336 -->대부업 법인의 경우<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1338 -->)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1339 -->대부업등록증 사본<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 1343 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1345 -->*<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1347 -->법인 대표가 직접 담당하는 경우<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1349 --> 3)<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1350 -->을<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1352 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 1354 -->법인등기부등본<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 1355 -->으로 대체 가능하며<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1357 -->, 4)<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1358 -->는<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1361 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1362 -->대표자 신분증 사본<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 1363 -->만 보내주시면 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1365 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span></span><br>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 1370 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1374 -->투자자 유형 변경 신청<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1400 -->법인 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1402 --> : <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);                               </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><o:p><br></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 3.75pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 29.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 21pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1421 -->Q&amp;A&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1423 -->가이드라인 시행과 관련하여 투자자 분들이 헷갈려 하시는 부분에 대해 답변을 드립니다<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1425 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1429 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1431 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1435 -->투자한도가 계산되는 기준이 무엇인가요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1437 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1442 -->투자한도는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1444 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 1446 -->투자중인 원금 잔액<!-- /react-text --></b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1448 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1449 -->기준으로 일반 투자자에게<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1451 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1452 -->천만원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1454 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1455 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자에게<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1457 --> 4<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1458 -->천만원입니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1460 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 1465 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1467 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1471 -->한도를 다 채워서 투자하였습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1473 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1474 -->상환 받은 금액을 다시 투자할 수 있나요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1476 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1481 -->투자한 원금을 상환받으면 그만큼 투자한도가 다시 생기는 원리이므로<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1483 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1484 -->투자 가능합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1486 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1491 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1493 -->는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1495 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1496 -->펀디드에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1498 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1499 -->천만 원 이하<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1501 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1502 -->부동산에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1504 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1505 -->천만 원 이하<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1507 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1508 -->하나의 대출자에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1510 --> 5<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1511 -->백만 원 이하라는 조건 하에서 자유롭게 재투자할 수 있습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1513 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1518 -->소득요건을 구비한 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1520 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1522 -->역시 동일하게 펀디드에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1524 --> 4<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1525 -->천만 원 이하<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1527 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1528 -->하나의 대출자에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1530 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1531 -->천만 원 이하라는 조건 하에서 재투자가 가능합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1533 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 1538 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1540 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1544 -->대부업 개인사업자는 어떻게 분류가 되나요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1546 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1551 -->대부업 개인사업자는 기본적으로<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1553 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 1555 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 1556 -->로 분류됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1558 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1559 -->기타 요건을 갖추었을 경우 펀디드에 자료를 제출해주시면 투자자 유형을 변경해드립니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1561 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 1566 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1568 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1572 -->펀디드 포인트도 투자한도에 포함이 되나요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1574 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"></p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1580 -->1P<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1582 -->가<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1584 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1585 -->원의 가치를 지니고 있는 펀디드 포인트도 투자한도에 포함이 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1587 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1588 -->일반 투자자는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1590 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 1592 -->포인트를<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1594 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1595 -->포함하여<!-- /react-text --></b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1597 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1598 -->펀디드에 투자할 수 있는 금액이 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1600 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1601 -->천만 원입니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1603 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><br></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><br></span>
                              </p>
                            </div>

                        <h4 class="panel-title">
                          <a>
                            <span class="header-number">89</span>
                            <span class="header-title">[이벤트] 거짓말 같은 만우절 이벤트! (종료)</span>
                            <span class="header-created">2020-03-30</span>
                            <span class="header-collapse"></span>

                        </h4>
                      </div>
                      <div class="ReactCollapse--collapse" style="overflow: hidden; height: 0px;">
                        <div class="ReactCollapse--content">
                          <div class="panel-body">
                            <div class="body-title">
                              <span class="title">[이벤트] 거짓말 같은 만우절 이벤트! (종료)</span>
                              <span class="created">2020-03-30</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="body-contents">
                              <p><a href="https://funded.co.kr/investment"><img data-savepage-src="https://cocktailmkt.s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/bear/%EC%9C%A0%EB%8F%99%ED%99%94/%ED%8E%80%EB%94%94%EB%93%9C/%ED%8E%80%EB%94%94%EB%93%9C_%ED%99%88%ED%8E%98%EC%9D%B4%EC%A7%80%EA%B3%B5%EC%A7%80%EC%82%AC%ED%95%AD_%EB%A7%8C%EC%9A%B0%EC%A0%88_0330.png" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100%;"></a>
                              </p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 4911 -->2020.04.01 ~ 2020.04.10 까지&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><span style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><br></span></font><span style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0);"><span style="font-weight: 700;"><!-- react-text: 4916 -->거짓말 같은 만우절 이벤트&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span>
                                <!-- react-text: 4917 -->를 진행합니다!
                                <!-- /react-text -->
                              </p>
                              <hr>
                              <p style="font-family: &quot;nanum square&quot;, &quot;helvetica neue&quot;, roboto, arial, &quot;droid sans&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><span style="font-weight: 700; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0);"><!-- react-text: 4923 -->이벤트 내용<!-- /react-text --></span></font></font>
                              </p>
                              <p></p>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 4927 -->04.01 ~ 04.10에 오픈 한 상품에 한해<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 4930 -->투자 금액에 따라 포인트 리워드 증정!<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <p></p>
                              <p></p>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 4935 -->- 100 만원 투자하면 1 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 4938 -->- 200 만원 투자하면 2 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 4941 -->- 300 만원 투자하면 3 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 4944 -->- 400 만원 투자하면 4 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 4947 -->- 500 만원 투자하면 5 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><br>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 4952 -->* 본 이벤트는 각 상품당 개별로 적용됩니다.<!-- /react-text --><br><br></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 4957 -->ex)295 상품에 500 만원, 295-2상품에 500 만원 투자했다면<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 4960 -->295 상품 리워드로 25 만 point / 295-2 리워드로 25 만 point<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <hr>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 4967 -->이벤트 참여 유의 사항<!-- /react-text --></font></font>
                                  </p>
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 4973 -->- 본 이벤트는 펀디드 모든 회원을 대상으로 진행됩니다.<!-- /react-text --><br></font></font></font></font>
                                    <!-- react-text: 4975 -->- 포인트 지급은 상품 기표날을 기준으로 지급되며, 오직 투자에만 사용 가능합니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br>
                                    <!-- react-text: 4977 -->- 본 이벤트는 예산 소진 시 조기 마감될 수 있습니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br>
                                    <!-- react-text: 4979 -->- 이벤트 상품은 4월1일부터 진행됩니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br><br><br>
                                  </p>
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 4986 -->다음과 같은 경우 이벤트 참여가 취소 될 수 있습니다.<!-- /react-text --></font></font>
                                  </p>
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 4992 -->- 상품 대출 취소 시 이벤트 참여가 취소됩니다.<!-- /react-text --><br></font></font></font></font>
                                    <!-- react-text: 4994 -->- 투자 취소 시 이벤트 참여가 취소됩니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br>
                                    <!-- react-text: 4996 -->- 정당하지 않은 방법으로 참여할 경우, 이벤트 참여가 취소됩니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text -->
                                  </p></font>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="panel">

                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 5017 -->신한은행 연계시스템 오류로 인하여&nbsp; 인해 입,출금 등의 업무가 진행되지 않고 있습니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --><br>
                              </p>

                                <!-- react-text: 5020 -->불편 끼쳐 드려 죄송합니다.&nbsp;
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 5024 -->금일&nbsp; 점검 작업 중에 있으며, 이로 인하여 사이트 접속이 원활하지 않을 수 있습니다. 
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 5026 -->최대한 빠른 시간 내 처리할 예정이오니&nbsp; 이점 양해 부탁 드리겠습니다.&nbsp;
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>

                                <!-- react-text: 5030 -->감사합니다.

                                <!-- react-text: 5715 -->안녕하세요 펀디드입니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 5719 -->신한은행 연계시스템의 점검작업으로 인해 입,출금 등의 업무가 진행되지 않고 있습니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 5721 -->불편 끼쳐 드려 죄송합니다.&nbsp;

                                <!-- react-text: 5725 -->금일&nbsp; 갱신작업을 진행하고 있으며, 최대한 빨리 처리 하겠습니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 5727 -->이점 양해 부탁 드리겠습니다.&nbsp;

                <div class="notice-list">
                  <div class="panel-group">
                    <div class="panel">
                      <div class="panel-heading" role="button" tabindex="0" id="notice1">
                        <h4 class="panel-title">
                          <a>
                            <span class="header-number"><span class="header-badge">공지</span>
                            </span>
                            <span class="header-title">투자자 유형별 투자한도(2018.03.08 업데이트)</span>
                            <span class="header-created">2017-05-12</span>
                            <span class="header-collapse"></span>
                          </a>
                        </h4>
                      </div>
                      <div class="ReactCollapse--collapse" style="overflow: hidden; height: 0px;">
                        <div class="ReactCollapse--content">
                          <div class="panel-body">
                            <div class="body-title">
                              <span class="title">투자자 유형별 투자한도(2018.03.08 업데이트)</span>
                              <span class="created">2017-05-12</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="body-contents">
                              <h4><span style="font-size: 17px;"><!-- react-text: 1629 -->금융감독원의 P2P대출 가이드라인이 개정됨에 따라 펀디드에서는 2018년 3월 9일부터 일반 투자자의 투자한도가 변경됩니다. <!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </h4>
                              <h4><span style="font-size: 17px;"><!-- react-text: 1632 -->총 투자한도는 기존 1천만원에서 2천만원으로 상향되며, 부동산 상품 투자한도는 1천만원, 동일 차주 상품 투자한도는 5백만원입니다.<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </h4>
                              <div><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><br></span></span>
                              </div>
                              <div><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1640 -->유형별 투자한도<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1642 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></span>
                              </div>
                              <div><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1645 -->1<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1647 -->개의<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1649 -->&nbsp;P2P<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1650 -->업체 기준으로 유형별 투자한도가 적용되며<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1652 -->,&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1653 -->이는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US" style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 1655 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 1658 -->투자원금 잔액<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1660 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></span><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 1662 -->기준입니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1664 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1665 -->한도내에서 상환받은 금액을 재투자하실 수 있습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1667 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span></span></span><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><br></span></span></span><br>
                              </div>
                              <h4><b><font color="#04a777"><!-- react-text: 1676 -->P2P대출 가이드라인<!-- /react-text --></font><!-- react-text: 1677 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></b>
                              </h4>
                              <h6></h6>
                              <h5>
                                <table class="table table-bordered" style="text-align: center;">
                                  <tbody>
                                    <tr>
                                      <td>
                                        <h4><b><!-- react-text: 1686 -->유형<!-- /react-text --></b>
                                        </h4>
                                      </td>
                                      <td>
                                        <h4><b><!-- react-text: 1690 -->요건<!-- /react-text --></b>
                                        </h4>
                                      </td>
                                      <td>
                                        <h4><b><!-- react-text: 1694 -->투자한도<!-- /react-text --></b>
                                        </h4>
                                      </td>
                                    </tr>
                                    <tr>
                                      <td>
                                        <h5><b style="color: inherit; font-family: inherit; background-color: transparent;"><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1700 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b>
                                        </h5>
                                      </td>
                                      <td>
                                        <h5><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1704 -->-<!-- /react-text --></span>
                                        </h5>
                                      </td>
                                      <td>
                                        <h5><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1708 -->총 투자한도 : 2천만원<!-- /react-text --></span>
                                        </h5>
                                        <p><span style="color: inherit; font-family: inherit; background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1711 -->부동산 상품 : 1천만원<!-- /react-text --></span>
                                        </p>
                                        <p><span style="color: inherit; font-family: inherit; background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1714 -->동일 차주 상품 : <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: inherit; font-family: inherit; background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1716 -->5백만원<!-- /react-text --></span><br>
                                        </p>
                                      </td>
                                    </tr>
                                    <tr>
                                      <td>
                                        <h5><b style="color: inherit; font-family: inherit; background-color: transparent;"><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1723 -->소득요건 구비 개인투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b>
                                        </h5>
                                      </td>
                                      <td>
                                        <h5><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1727 -->이자/배당소득 2천만원 초과<!-- /react-text --></span><br><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1730 -->or<!-- /react-text --></span><br><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1733 -->사업/근로소득 1억원 초과<!-- /react-text --></span>
                                        </h5>
                                      </td>
                                      <td>
                                        <h5><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1737 -->총 투자한도 : 4천만원<!-- /react-text --></span>
                                        </h5>
                                        <h5><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1740 -->동일 차주 상품 :&nbsp;2천만원<!-- /react-text --></span><br>
                                        </h5>
                                      </td>
                                    </tr>
                                    <tr>
                                      <td>
                                        <h5><b><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1747 -->개인 전문 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b>
                                        </h5>
                                      </td>
                                      <td>
                                        <h5><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1751 -->금융투자협회 지정 전문투자자<!-- /react-text --></span>
                                        </h5>
                                      </td>
                                      <td>
                                        <h5><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1755 -->제한 없음<!-- /react-text --></span>

                                    <tr>
                                      <td>
                                        <h5><b><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 1761 -->법인 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b>
