                                  </tbody>
                                </table>
                              </h5>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1773 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1775 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><br>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1779 -->가이드라인 개정에 따라 일반 투자자의 투자 한도가 상향되었습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1781 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1785 -->개인으로 회원가입을 하면 자동적으로<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1787 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 1789 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 1790 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1792 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1793 -->일반 개인투자자는<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1796 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1797 -->펀디드 상품 전체에 대해서는 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1799 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1800 -->천만 원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1802 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1803 -->부동산 상품에 대해서는 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1805 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1806 -->천만 원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1808 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1809 -->동일대출자 상품에 대해서는 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1811 --> 5<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1812 -->백만 원 투자 가능합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1814 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1816 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1817 -->이 이상으로 투자하기 위해서는 추가<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1819 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1820 -->요건을 갖추고 증빙서류를 펀디드에 제출하면 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1822 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 1827 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1831 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1836 -->개인으로 회원가입 후 증빙서류를 제출하면<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1838 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 1840 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 1841 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1843 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1847 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자는 펀디드를 통해 대출받는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1849 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 1851 -->동일 대출자에 대해<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1853 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1854 -->천만원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1856 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1857 -->펀디드 상품 전체에 대해서는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1859 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1860 -->최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1862 --> 4<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1863 -->천만원까지<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1865 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1866 -->투자원금 잔액 기준<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1868 -->) <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1869 -->투자 가능<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 1870 -->합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1872 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 1877 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1880 -->요건은 두 가지 중<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1883 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></b></span><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1886 -->하나 이상<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1888 -->을 충족하면 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1890 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1894 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1896 -->이자<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1898 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1899 -->배당소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1901 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1902 -->천만 원 초과 or 2)<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1904 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1906 -->사업<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1908 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1909 -->근로소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1911 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1912 -->억 원 초과<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 1916 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1919 -->증빙서류<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1921 --> :&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1924 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1927 -->직전과세기간<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1929 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1930 -->종합소득세 과세표준 확정신고서<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1932 --> + <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1933 -->종합소득세 신고서 접수증<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1935 -->) &nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1937 -->or<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1939 -->&nbsp;(<!-- /react-text --></span><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1942 -->근로소득 원천징수영수증<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1944 -->)<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1949 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1951 -->이자<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1953 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1954 -->배당소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1956 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1957 -->천만원 초과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1959 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 1961 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 1963 -->종합소득 과세표준 확정신고서의<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1965 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1966 -->이자소득금액과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1968 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1969 -->배당소득금액의 합 기준<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1971 -->)<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1975 -->2) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1977 -->사업소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1979 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1980 -->억원 초과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1982 --> (<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1983 -->종합소득 과세표준 확정신고서의 사업소득명세서<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1985 --> - <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1986 -->소득금액 기준<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1988 -->)<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1992 -->3) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 1994 -->근로소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1996 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 1997 -->억원 초과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 1999 --> (<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2000 -->근로소득 원천징수영수증의 근로소득금액 기준<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2002 -->)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 2007 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2010 -->종합소득세 신고서 발급은<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2012 --> 1) <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2013 -->국세청 홈택스 홈페이지<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2015 --> 2)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2016 -->세무대리인을 통해서 할 수 있습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2018 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US"><a href="https://www.hometax.go.kr/" target="_blank"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2025 -->국세청<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2028 --> <!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2031 -->홈택스<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2034 --> <!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2037 -->바로가기<!-- /react-text --></span></span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2039 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2043 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2045 -->신고<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2047 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2048 -->납부<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2050 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2051 -->세금신고<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2053 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2054 -->종합소득세<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2056 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2057 -->신고내역<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2059 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2060 -->신고서보기<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2062 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2063 -->종합소득세 과세표준 확정신고서 출력<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2065 -->)<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 2070 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2074 -->개인 전문투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2079 -->개인으로 회원가입 후 증빙서류를 제출하면<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2081 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 2083 -->개인 전문투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 2084 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2086 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2087 -->개인 전문투자자는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2089 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 2091 -->금액 제한 없이 펀디드 상품에 자유롭게 투자 가능<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 2092 -->합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2094 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 2099 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2102 -->금융투자협회 지정 전문투자자는 다음의<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2104 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2107 -->세 가지 요건 모두<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2109 -->를 충족해야 합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2111 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2115 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2117 -->신청일 직전 영업일 기준 금융투자상품 잔고<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2119 --> 5<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2120 -->억 원 이상<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2125 -->2) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2127 -->직전 년도의 연소득이<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2129 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2130 -->억 원 이상이거나 제출일 직전 영업일 기준 재산가액<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2132 --> 10<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2133 -->억 원 이상<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2138 -->3) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2140 -->금융투자회사에서 계좌를 개설한 날로부터<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2142 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2143 -->년 이상 경과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 2149 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2152 -->증빙서류<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2154 --> :&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 2157 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2160 -->금융투자협회 전문투자자 확인증<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2162 -->)<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2171 -->신청은<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2173 --> <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 굴림; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2175 -->금융투자협회<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2185 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.kofia.or.kr/wpge/m_175/sub041201.do" target="_blank"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 굴림; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2191 -->금융투자협회<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2194 --> <!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 굴림; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2197 -->바로가기<!-- /react-text --></span></span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2199 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><br>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2205 -->법인 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2208 -->법인회원 가입 후 증빙서류를 제출하면<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2210 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 2212 -->법인투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 2213 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2215 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2216 -->법인투자자는<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2219 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2220 -->금액 제한 없이 펀디드 상품에 자유롭게 투자 가능<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 2221 -->합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2223 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 2228 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2231 -->증빙서류<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2236 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2238 -->사업자등록증 및 법인통장 사본<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2241 -->2)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 2243 -->법인인감증명서<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2248 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 2250 -->담당자 서류<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 2260 -->,&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 2262 -->신분증 사본<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);                               </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2271 -->4)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2273 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2275 -->대부업 법인의 경우<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2277 -->)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2278 -->대부업등록증 사본<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 2282 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2284 -->*<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2286 -->법인 대표가 직접 담당하는 경우<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2288 --> 3)<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2289 -->을<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2291 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 2293 -->법인등기부등본<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 2294 -->으로 대체 가능하며<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2296 -->, 4)<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2297 -->는<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2300 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2301 -->대표자 신분증 사본<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 2302 -->만 보내주시면 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2304 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span></span><br>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 2309 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2313 -->투자자 유형 변경 신청<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2318 -->소득요건 구비 개인투자자<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2320 --> / <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2321 -->개인 전문투자자<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2323 --> : <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2324 -->일반<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2326 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2327 -->개인<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2329 -->)<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2330 -->회원으로 가입 후<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2332 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2335 -->ask@funded.co.kr<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2337 -->로 증빙서류를 제출,&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2339 -->법인 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2341 --> : <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2343 -->법인회원으로 가입 후<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2345 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><b><!-- react-text: 2347 -->ask@funded.co.kr<!-- /react-text --></b></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2349 -->로 증빙서류를 제출합니다<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2351 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><o:p><br></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 3.75pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 29.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 21pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2360 -->Q&amp;A&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2362 -->가이드라인 시행과 관련하여 투자자 분들이 헷갈려 하시는 부분에 대해 답변을 드립니다<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2364 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2368 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2370 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2374 -->투자한도가 계산되는 기준이 무엇인가요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2376 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2381 -->투자한도는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2383 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 2385 -->투자중인 원금 잔액<!-- /react-text --></b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2387 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2388 -->기준으로 일반 투자자에게<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2390 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2391 -->천만원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2393 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2394 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자에게<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2396 --> 4<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2397 -->천만원입니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2399 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 2404 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2406 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2410 -->한도를 다 채워서 투자하였습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2412 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2413 -->상환 받은 금액을 다시 투자할 수 있나요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2415 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2420 -->투자한 원금을 상환받으면 그만큼 투자한도가 다시 생기는 원리이므로<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2422 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2423 -->투자 가능합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2425 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2430 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2432 -->는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2434 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2435 -->펀디드에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2437 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2438 -->천만 원 이하<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2440 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2441 -->부동산에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2443 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2444 -->천만 원 이하<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2446 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2447 -->하나의 대출자에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2449 --> 5<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2450 -->백만 원 이하라는 조건 하에서 자유롭게 재투자할 수 있습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2452 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2457 -->소득요건을 구비한 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2459 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2461 -->역시 동일하게 펀디드에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2463 --> 4<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2464 -->천만 원 이하<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2466 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2467 -->하나의 대출자에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2469 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2470 -->천만 원 이하라는 조건 하에서 재투자가 가능합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2472 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 2477 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2479 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2483 -->대부업 개인사업자는 어떻게 분류가 되나요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2485 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2490 -->대부업 개인사업자는 기본적으로<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2492 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 2494 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 2495 -->로 분류됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2497 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2498 -->기타 요건을 갖추었을 경우 펀디드에 자료를 제출해주시면 투자자 유형을 변경해드립니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2500 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 2505 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2507 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2511 -->펀디드 포인트도 투자한도에 포함이 되나요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2513 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"></p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2519 -->1P<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2521 -->가<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2523 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2524 -->원의 가치를 지니고 있는 펀디드 포인트도 투자한도에 포함이 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2526 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2527 -->일반 투자자는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2529 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 2531 -->포인트를<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2533 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2534 -->포함하여<!-- /react-text --></b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2536 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2537 -->펀디드에 투자할 수 있는 금액이 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2539 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2540 -->천만 원입니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2542 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><br></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><br></span>
                              </p>

                              <h4 style="font-family: &quot;nanum square&quot;, &quot;helvetica neue&quot;, roboto, arial, &quot;droid sans&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(45, 46, 53);">

                          <a>
                            <span class="header-number">89</span>
                            <span class="header-title">[이벤트] 거짓말 같은 만우절 이벤트! (종료)</span>

                            <span class="header-collapse"></span>
                          </a>
                        </h4>
                      </div>
                      <div class="ReactCollapse--collapse" style="overflow: hidden; height: 0px;">
                        <div class="ReactCollapse--content">
                          <div class="panel-body">
                            <div class="body-title">
                              <span class="title">[이벤트] 거짓말 같은 만우절 이벤트! (종료)</span>
                              <span class="created">2020-03-30</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="body-contents">
                              <p><a href="https://funded.co.kr/investment"><img data-savepage-src="https://cocktailmkt.s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/bear/%EC%9C%A0%EB%8F%99%ED%99%94/%ED%8E%80%EB%94%94%EB%93%9C/%ED%8E%80%EB%94%94%EB%93%9C_%ED%99%88%ED%8E%98%EC%9D%B4%EC%A7%80%EA%B3%B5%EC%A7%80%EC%82%AC%ED%95%AD_%EB%A7%8C%EC%9A%B0%EC%A0%88_0330.png" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100%;"></a>
                              </p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 6622 -->2020.04.01 ~ 2020.04.10 까지&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><span style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><br></span></font><span style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0);"><span style="font-weight: 700;"><!-- react-text: 6627 -->거짓말 같은 만우절 이벤트&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span>
                                <!-- react-text: 6628 -->를 진행합니다!
                                <!-- /react-text -->
                              </p>
                              <hr>
                              <p style="font-family: &quot;nanum square&quot;, &quot;helvetica neue&quot;, roboto, arial, &quot;droid sans&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><span style="font-weight: 700; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0);"><!-- react-text: 6634 -->이벤트 내용<!-- /react-text --></span></font></font>
                              </p>
                              <p></p>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 6638 -->04.01 ~ 04.10에 오픈 한 상품에 한해<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 6641 -->투자 금액에 따라 포인트 리워드 증정!<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <p></p>
                              <p></p>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 6646 -->- 100 만원 투자하면 1 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 6649 -->- 200 만원 투자하면 2 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 6652 -->- 300 만원 투자하면 3 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 6655 -->- 400 만원 투자하면 4 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 6658 -->- 500 만원 투자하면 5 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><br>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 6663 -->* 본 이벤트는 각 상품당 개별로 적용됩니다.<!-- /react-text --><br><br></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 6668 -->ex)295 상품에 500 만원, 295-2상품에 500 만원 투자했다면<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 6671 -->295 상품 리워드로 25 만 point / 295-2 리워드로 25 만 point<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <hr>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 6678 -->이벤트 참여 유의 사항<!-- /react-text --></font></font>
                                  </p>
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 6684 -->- 본 이벤트는 펀디드 모든 회원을 대상으로 진행됩니다.<!-- /react-text --><br></font></font></font></font>
                                    <!-- react-text: 6686 -->- 포인트 지급은 상품 기표날을 기준으로 지급되며, 오직 투자에만 사용 가능합니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br>
                                    <!-- react-text: 6688 -->- 본 이벤트는 예산 소진 시 조기 마감될 수 있습니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br>
                                    <!-- react-text: 6690 -->- 이벤트 상품은 4월1일부터 진행됩니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br><br><br>
                                  </p>
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 6697 -->다음과 같은 경우 이벤트 참여가 취소 될 수 있습니다.<!-- /react-text --></font></font>
                                  </p>
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 6703 -->- 상품 대출 취소 시 이벤트 참여가 취소됩니다.<!-- /react-text --><br></font></font></font></font>
                                    <!-- react-text: 6705 -->- 투자 취소 시 이벤트 참여가 취소됩니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br>
                                    <!-- react-text: 6707 -->- 정당하지 않은 방법으로 참여할 경우, 이벤트 참여가 취소됩니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text -->
                                  </p></font>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>

                            <span class="header-number">88</span>

                            <div class="body-title">
                              <span class="title">신한은행 시스템 오류 사이트 점검 안내 (완료)</span>

                            <div class="body-contents">
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 6724 -->안녕하세요 펀디드입니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 6728 -->신한은행 연계시스템 오류로 인하여&nbsp; 인해 입,출금 등의 업무가 진행되지 않고 있습니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 6731 -->불편 끼쳐 드려 죄송합니다.&nbsp;
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 6735 -->금일&nbsp; 점검 작업 중에 있으며, 이로 인하여 사이트 접속이 원활하지 않을 수 있습니다. 
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 6737 -->최대한 빠른 시간 내 처리할 예정이오니&nbsp; 이점 양해 부탁 드리겠습니다.&nbsp;
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 6741 -->감사합니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 6745 -->펀디드 드림.
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                            </div>
                          </div>

                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 7430 -->신한은행 연계시스템의 점검작업으로 인해 입,출금 등의 업무가 진행되지 않고 있습니다.

                      <div class="panel-heading" role="button" tabindex="0" id="notice1">
                        <h4 class="panel-title">
                          <a>
                            <span class="header-number"><span class="header-badge">공지</span>
                            </span>
                            <span class="header-title">투자자 유형별 투자한도(2018.03.08 업데이트)</span>
                            <span class="header-created">2017-05-12</span>
                            <span class="header-collapse"></span>
                          </a>
                        </h4>
                      </div>
                      <div class="ReactCollapse--collapse" style="overflow: hidden; height: 0px;">
                        <div class="ReactCollapse--content">
                          <div class="panel-body">
                            <div class="body-title">
                              <span class="title">투자자 유형별 투자한도(2018.03.08 업데이트)</span>
                              <span class="created">2017-05-12</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="body-contents">
                              <h4><span style="font-size: 17px;"><!-- react-text: 2568 -->금융감독원의 P2P대출 가이드라인이 개정됨에 따라 펀디드에서는 2018년 3월 9일부터 일반 투자자의 투자한도가 변경됩니다. <!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </h4>
                              <h4><span style="font-size: 17px;"><!-- react-text: 2571 -->총 투자한도는 기존 1천만원에서 2천만원으로 상향되며, 부동산 상품 투자한도는 1천만원, 동일 차주 상품 투자한도는 5백만원입니다.<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </h4>
                              <div><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><br></span></span>
                              </div>
                              <div><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2579 -->유형별 투자한도<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2581 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></span>
                              </div>
                              <div><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2584 -->1<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2586 -->개의<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2588 -->&nbsp;P2P<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2589 -->업체 기준으로 유형별 투자한도가 적용되며<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2591 -->,&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2592 -->이는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US" style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 2594 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 2597 -->투자원금 잔액<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2599 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></span><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 2601 -->기준입니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2603 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2604 -->한도내에서 상환받은 금액을 재투자하실 수 있습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2606 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span></span></span><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><br></span></span></span><br>
                              </div>
                              <h4><b><font color="#04a777"><!-- react-text: 2615 -->P2P대출 가이드라인<!-- /react-text --></font><!-- react-text: 2616 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></b>
                              </h4>
                              <h6></h6>
                              <h5>
                                <table class="table table-bordered" style="text-align: center;">
                                  <tbody>
                                    <tr>
                                      <td>
                                        <h4><b><!-- react-text: 2625 -->유형<!-- /react-text --></b>
                                        </h4>
                                      </td>

                                        </h4>
                                      </td>
                                    </tr>
                                    <tr>
                                      <td>
                                        <h5><b style="color: inherit; font-family: inherit; background-color: transparent;"><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 2639 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b>
                                        </h5>
                                      </td>
                                      <td>
                                        <h5><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 2643 -->-<!-- /react-text --></span>
                                        </h5>
                                      </td>
                                      <td>
                                        <h5><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 2647 -->총 투자한도 : 2천만원<!-- /react-text --></span>

                                        <p><span style="color: inherit; font-family: inherit; background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 2650 -->부동산 상품 : 1천만원<!-- /react-text --></span>
                                        </p>
                                        <p><span style="color: inherit; font-family: inherit; background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 2653 -->동일 차주 상품 : <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: inherit; font-family: inherit; background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 2655 -->5백만원<!-- /react-text --></span><br>
                                        </p>

                                        </h5>
                                      </td>
                                      <td>
                                        <h5><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 2666 -->이자/배당소득 2천만원 초과<!-- /react-text --></span><br><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 2669 -->or<!-- /react-text --></span><br><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 2672 -->사업/근로소득 1억원 초과<!-- /react-text --></span>
                                        </h5>
