                                        <h5><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 2708 -->제한 없음<!-- /react-text --></span>
                                        </h5>
                                      </td>
                                    </tr>
                                  </tbody>
                                </table>
                              </h5>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2712 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2714 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><br>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2718 -->가이드라인 개정에 따라 일반 투자자의 투자 한도가 상향되었습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2720 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2724 -->개인으로 회원가입을 하면 자동적으로<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2726 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 2728 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 2729 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2731 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2732 -->일반 개인투자자는<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2735 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2736 -->펀디드 상품 전체에 대해서는 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2738 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2739 -->천만 원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2741 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2742 -->부동산 상품에 대해서는 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2744 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2745 -->천만 원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2747 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2748 -->동일대출자 상품에 대해서는 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2750 --> 5<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2751 -->백만 원 투자 가능합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2753 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2755 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2756 -->이 이상으로 투자하기 위해서는 추가<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2758 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2759 -->요건을 갖추고 증빙서류를 펀디드에 제출하면 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2761 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 2766 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2770 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2775 -->개인으로 회원가입 후 증빙서류를 제출하면<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2777 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 2779 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 2780 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2782 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2786 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자는 펀디드를 통해 대출받는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2788 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 2790 -->동일 대출자에 대해<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2792 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2793 -->천만원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2795 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2796 -->펀디드 상품 전체에 대해서는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2798 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2799 -->최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2801 --> 4<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2802 -->천만원까지<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2804 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2805 -->투자원금 잔액 기준<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2807 -->) <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2808 -->투자 가능<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 2809 -->합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2811 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 2816 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2819 -->요건은 두 가지 중<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2822 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></b></span><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2825 -->하나 이상<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2827 -->을 충족하면 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2829 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2833 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2835 -->이자<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2837 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2838 -->배당소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2840 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2841 -->천만 원 초과 or 2)<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2843 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2845 -->사업<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2847 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2848 -->근로소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2850 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2851 -->억 원 초과<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 2855 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2858 -->증빙서류<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2860 --> :&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2863 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2866 -->직전과세기간<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2868 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2869 -->종합소득세 과세표준 확정신고서<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2871 --> + <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2872 -->종합소득세 신고서 접수증<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2874 -->) &nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2876 -->or<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2878 -->&nbsp;(<!-- /react-text --></span><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2881 -->근로소득 원천징수영수증<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2883 -->)<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2888 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2890 -->이자<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2892 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2893 -->배당소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2895 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2896 -->천만원 초과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2898 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 2900 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 2902 -->종합소득 과세표준 확정신고서의<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2904 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2905 -->이자소득금액과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2907 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2908 -->배당소득금액의 합 기준<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2910 -->)<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2914 -->2) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2916 -->사업소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2918 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2919 -->억원 초과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2921 --> (<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2922 -->종합소득 과세표준 확정신고서의 사업소득명세서<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2924 --> - <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2925 -->소득금액 기준<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2927 -->)<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2931 -->3) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2933 -->근로소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2935 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2936 -->억원 초과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2938 --> (<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2939 -->근로소득 원천징수영수증의 근로소득금액 기준<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2941 -->)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 2946 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2949 -->종합소득세 신고서 발급은<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2951 --> 1) <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2952 -->국세청 홈택스 홈페이지<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2954 --> 2)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2955 -->세무대리인을 통해서 할 수 있습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2957 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US"><a href="https://www.hometax.go.kr/" target="_blank"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2964 -->국세청<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2967 --> <!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2970 -->홈택스<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2973 --> <!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2976 -->바로가기<!-- /react-text --></span></span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2978 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2982 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 2984 -->신고<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2986 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2987 -->납부<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2989 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2990 -->세금신고<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2992 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2993 -->종합소득세<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2995 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2996 -->신고내역<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 2998 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 2999 -->신고서보기<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3001 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3002 -->종합소득세 과세표준 확정신고서 출력<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3004 -->)<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 3009 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3013 -->개인 전문투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3018 -->개인으로 회원가입 후 증빙서류를 제출하면<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3020 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 3022 -->개인 전문투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 3023 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3025 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3026 -->개인 전문투자자는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3028 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 3030 -->금액 제한 없이 펀디드 상품에 자유롭게 투자 가능<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 3031 -->합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3033 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 3038 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3041 -->금융투자협회 지정 전문투자자는 다음의<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3043 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3046 -->세 가지 요건 모두<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3048 -->를 충족해야 합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3050 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3054 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3056 -->신청일 직전 영업일 기준 금융투자상품 잔고<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3058 --> 5<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3059 -->억 원 이상<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3064 -->2) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3066 -->직전 년도의 연소득이<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3068 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3069 -->억 원 이상이거나 제출일 직전 영업일 기준 재산가액<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3071 --> 10<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3072 -->억 원 이상<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3077 -->3) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3079 -->금융투자회사에서 계좌를 개설한 날로부터<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3081 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3082 -->년 이상 경과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 3088 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3091 -->증빙서류<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3093 --> :&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 3096 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3099 -->금융투자협회 전문투자자 확인증<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3101 -->)<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3112 --> <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 굴림; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3114 -->금융투자협회<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt;                               </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.kofia.or.kr/wpge/m_175/sub041201.do" target="_blank"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 굴림; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3130 -->금융투자협회<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3133 --> <!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 굴림; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3136 -->바로가기<!-- /react-text --></span></span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3138 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><br>

                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3147 -->법인회원 가입 후 증빙서류를 제출하면<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3149 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 3151 -->법인투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 3152 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3154 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3155 -->법인투자자는<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3158 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3159 -->금액 제한 없이 펀디드 상품에 자유롭게 투자 가능<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 3160 -->합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3162 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 3167 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>

                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3175 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3177 -->사업자등록증 및 법인통장 사본<!-- /react-text --></span>

                              </p>

                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3210 -->4)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3212 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3214 -->대부업 법인의 경우<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3216 -->)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3217 -->대부업등록증 사본<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 3221 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3223 -->*<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3225 -->법인 대표가 직접 담당하는 경우<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3227 --> 3)<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3228 -->을<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3230 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 3232 -->법인등기부등본<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 3233 -->으로 대체 가능하며<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3235 -->, 4)<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3236 -->는<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3239 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3240 -->대표자 신분증 사본<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 3241 -->만 보내주시면 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3243 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span></span><br>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 3248 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>

                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3278 -->법인 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3280 --> : <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);                               </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><o:p><br></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 3.75pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 29.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 21pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3299 -->Q&amp;A&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3301 -->가이드라인 시행과 관련하여 투자자 분들이 헷갈려 하시는 부분에 대해 답변을 드립니다<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3303 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span>

                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3313 -->투자한도가 계산되는 기준이 무엇인가요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3315 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3320 -->투자한도는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3322 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 3324 -->투자중인 원금 잔액<!-- /react-text --></b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3326 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3327 -->기준으로 일반 투자자에게<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3329 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3330 -->천만원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3332 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3333 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자에게<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3335 --> 4<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3336 -->천만원입니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3338 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 3343 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3345 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3349 -->한도를 다 채워서 투자하였습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3351 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3352 -->상환 받은 금액을 다시 투자할 수 있나요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3354 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3359 -->투자한 원금을 상환받으면 그만큼 투자한도가 다시 생기는 원리이므로<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3361 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3362 -->투자 가능합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3364 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3369 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3371 -->는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3373 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3374 -->펀디드에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3376 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3377 -->천만 원 이하<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3379 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3380 -->부동산에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3382 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3383 -->천만 원 이하<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3385 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3386 -->하나의 대출자에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3388 --> 5<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3389 -->백만 원 이하라는 조건 하에서 자유롭게 재투자할 수 있습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3391 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3396 -->소득요건을 구비한 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3398 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3400 -->역시 동일하게 펀디드에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3402 --> 4<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3403 -->천만 원 이하<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3405 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3406 -->하나의 대출자에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3408 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3409 -->천만 원 이하라는 조건 하에서 재투자가 가능합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3411 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 3416 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3418 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3422 -->대부업 개인사업자는 어떻게 분류가 되나요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3424 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3429 -->대부업 개인사업자는 기본적으로<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3431 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 3433 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 3434 -->로 분류됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3436 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3437 -->기타 요건을 갖추었을 경우 펀디드에 자료를 제출해주시면 투자자 유형을 변경해드립니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3439 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 3444 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3446 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3450 -->펀디드 포인트도 투자한도에 포함이 되나요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3452 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"></p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3458 -->1P<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3460 -->가<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3462 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3463 -->원의 가치를 지니고 있는 펀디드 포인트도 투자한도에 포함이 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3465 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3466 -->일반 투자자는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3468 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 3470 -->포인트를<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3472 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3473 -->포함하여<!-- /react-text --></b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3475 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3476 -->펀디드에 투자할 수 있는 금액이 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3478 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3479 -->천만 원입니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3481 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><br></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><br></span>
                              </p>

                      </div>

                        <div class="ReactCollapse--content">
                          <div class="panel-body">
                            <div class="body-title">
                              <span class="title">[이벤트] 거짓말 같은 만우절 이벤트! (종료)</span>
                              <span class="created">2020-03-30</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="body-contents">
                              <p><a href="https://funded.co.kr/investment"><img data-savepage-src="https://cocktailmkt.s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/bear/%EC%9C%A0%EB%8F%99%ED%99%94/%ED%8E%80%EB%94%94%EB%93%9C/%ED%8E%80%EB%94%94%EB%93%9C_%ED%99%88%ED%8E%98%EC%9D%B4%EC%A7%80%EA%B3%B5%EC%A7%80%EC%82%AC%ED%95%AD_%EB%A7%8C%EC%9A%B0%EC%A0%88_0330.png" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100%;"></a>
                              </p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 8333 -->2020.04.01 ~ 2020.04.10 까지&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><span style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><br></span></font><span style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0);"><span style="font-weight: 700;"><!-- react-text: 8338 -->거짓말 같은 만우절 이벤트&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span>
                                <!-- react-text: 8339 -->를 진행합니다!
                                <!-- /react-text -->
                              </p>
                              <hr>
                              <p style="font-family: &quot;nanum square&quot;, &quot;helvetica neue&quot;, roboto, arial, &quot;droid sans&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><span style="font-weight: 700; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0);"><!-- react-text: 8345 -->이벤트 내용<!-- /react-text --></span></font></font>
                              </p>
                              <p></p>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 8349 -->04.01 ~ 04.10에 오픈 한 상품에 한해<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 8352 -->투자 금액에 따라 포인트 리워드 증정!<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <p></p>
                              <p></p>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 8357 -->- 100 만원 투자하면 1 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 8360 -->- 200 만원 투자하면 2 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 8363 -->- 300 만원 투자하면 3 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 8366 -->- 400 만원 투자하면 4 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 8369 -->- 500 만원 투자하면 5 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><br>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 8374 -->* 본 이벤트는 각 상품당 개별로 적용됩니다.<!-- /react-text --><br><br></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 8379 -->ex)295 상품에 500 만원, 295-2상품에 500 만원 투자했다면<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 8382 -->295 상품 리워드로 25 만 point / 295-2 리워드로 25 만 point<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <hr>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 8389 -->이벤트 참여 유의 사항<!-- /react-text --></font></font>
                                  </p>
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 8395 -->- 본 이벤트는 펀디드 모든 회원을 대상으로 진행됩니다.<!-- /react-text --><br></font></font></font></font>
                                    <!-- react-text: 8397 -->- 포인트 지급은 상품 기표날을 기준으로 지급되며, 오직 투자에만 사용 가능합니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br>
                                    <!-- react-text: 8399 -->- 본 이벤트는 예산 소진 시 조기 마감될 수 있습니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br>
                                    <!-- react-text: 8401 -->- 이벤트 상품은 4월1일부터 진행됩니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br><br><br>
                                  </p>
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 8408 -->다음과 같은 경우 이벤트 참여가 취소 될 수 있습니다.<!-- /react-text --></font></font>
                                  </p>
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 8414 -->- 상품 대출 취소 시 이벤트 참여가 취소됩니다.<!-- /react-text --><br></font></font></font></font>
                                    <!-- react-text: 8416 -->- 투자 취소 시 이벤트 참여가 취소됩니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br>
                                    <!-- react-text: 8418 -->- 정당하지 않은 방법으로 참여할 경우, 이벤트 참여가 취소됩니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text -->
                                  </p></font>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>

                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 8439 -->신한은행 연계시스템 오류로 인하여&nbsp; 인해 입,출금 등의 업무가 진행되지 않고 있습니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 8442 -->불편 끼쳐 드려 죄송합니다.&nbsp;
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 8446 -->금일&nbsp; 점검 작업 중에 있으며, 이로 인하여 사이트 접속이 원활하지 않을 수 있습니다. 
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 8448 -->최대한 빠른 시간 내 처리할 예정이오니&nbsp; 이점 양해 부탁 드리겠습니다.&nbsp;
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 8452 -->감사합니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>

                              </p>

                              <h4 style="font-family: &quot;nanum square&quot;, &quot;helvetica neue&quot;, roboto, arial, &quot;droid sans&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(45, 46, 53);">
                                <!-- react-text: 8615 -->3. 부실채권 매각내역
                                <!-- /react-text --></h4>

                          <a>
                            <span class="header-number">81</span>

                          </a>

                            <div class="body-title">
                              <span class="title">신한은행 연계시스템의 점검작업 안내 (완료)</span>
                              <span class="created">2019-12-12</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="body-contents">
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 9137 -->안녕하세요 펀디드입니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 9141 -->신한은행 연계시스템의 점검작업으로 인해 입,출금 등의 업무가 진행되지 않고 있습니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 9143 -->불편 끼쳐 드려 죄송합니다.&nbsp;
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 9147 -->금일&nbsp; 갱신작업을 진행하고 있으며, 최대한 빨리 처리 하겠습니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 9149 -->이점 양해 부탁 드리겠습니다.&nbsp;
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 9153 -->불편을 끼쳐드려 죄송합니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                            </div>
                          </div>

                                      <td style="line-height: 1.42857;">
                                        <!-- react-text: 9544 -->357,916,869
                                        <!-- /react-text --></td>
                                      <td style="line-height: 1.42857;">
                                        <!-- react-text: 9546 -->96,151,275
                                        <!-- /react-text --></td>
                                      <td style="line-height: 1.42857;">
                                        <!-- react-text: 9548 -->0
                                        <!-- /react-text --></td>
                                      <td style="line-height: 1.42857;">
                                        <!-- react-text: 9550 -->454,068,144
                                        <!-- /react-text --></td>
                                    </tr>
                                    <tr>
                                      <td style="line-height: 1.42857;">
                                        <!-- react-text: 9553 -->투자자 실 회수율
                                        <!-- /react-text --></td>
                                      <td style="line-height: 1.42857;">
                                        <!-- react-text: 9555 -->66.65&nbsp;%
                                        <!-- /react-text --></td>
                                      <td style="line-height: 1.42857;">
                                        <!-- react-text: 9557 -->106.83&nbsp;%
                                        <!-- /react-text --></td>
                                      <td style="line-height: 1.42857;">
                                        <!-- react-text: 9559 -->0&nbsp;%
                                        <!-- /react-text --></td>
                                      <td style="line-height: 1.42857;">
                                        <!-- react-text: 9561 -->72.42&nbsp;%
                                        <!-- /react-text --></td>

                                  </tbody>
                                </table>
                              </h4>
                            </div>

                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="notice-list">
                  <div class="panel-group">
                    <div class="panel">
                      <div class="panel-heading" role="button" tabindex="0" id="notice1">
                        <h4 class="panel-title">
                          <a>
                            <span class="header-number"><span class="header-badge">공지</span>
                            </span>
                            <span class="header-title">투자자 유형별 투자한도(2018.03.08 업데이트)</span>
                            <span class="header-created">2017-05-12</span>
                            <span class="header-collapse"></span>
                          </a>
                        </h4>
                      </div>
                      <div class="ReactCollapse--collapse" style="overflow: hidden; height: 0px;">
                        <div class="ReactCollapse--content">
                          <div class="panel-body">
                            <div class="body-title">
                              <span class="title">투자자 유형별 투자한도(2018.03.08 업데이트)</span>
                              <span class="created">2017-05-12</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="body-contents">
                              <h4><span style="font-size: 17px;"><!-- react-text: 3507 -->금융감독원의 P2P대출 가이드라인이 개정됨에 따라 펀디드에서는 2018년 3월 9일부터 일반 투자자의 투자한도가 변경됩니다. <!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </h4>
                              <h4><span style="font-size: 17px;"><!-- react-text: 3510 -->총 투자한도는 기존 1천만원에서 2천만원으로 상향되며, 부동산 상품 투자한도는 1천만원, 동일 차주 상품 투자한도는 5백만원입니다.<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </h4>
                              <div><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><br></span></span>
                              </div>
                              <div><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3518 -->유형별 투자한도<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3520 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></span>
                              </div>
                              <div><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3523 -->1<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3525 -->개의<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3527 -->&nbsp;P2P<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3528 -->업체 기준으로 유형별 투자한도가 적용되며<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3530 -->,&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3531 -->이는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US" style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 3533 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 3536 -->투자원금 잔액<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3538 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></span><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 3540 -->기준입니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3542 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3543 -->한도내에서 상환받은 금액을 재투자하실 수 있습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3545 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span></span></span><span style="font-weight: 700;"><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><br></span></span></span><br>
                              </div>
                              <h4><b><font color="#04a777"><!-- react-text: 3554 -->P2P대출 가이드라인<!-- /react-text --></font><!-- react-text: 3555 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></b>
                              </h4>
                              <h6></h6>
                              <h5>
                                <table class="table table-bordered" style="text-align: center;">

                                        <h5><b style="color: inherit; font-family: inherit; background-color: transparent;"><span style="font-size: 14px;"><!-- react-text: 3578 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b>
                                        </h5>
                                      </td>

                                        </p>
