                              </h5>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3651 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3653 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><br>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3657 -->가이드라인 개정에 따라 일반 투자자의 투자 한도가 상향되었습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3659 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3663 -->개인으로 회원가입을 하면 자동적으로<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3665 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 3667 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 3668 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3670 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3671 -->일반 개인투자자는<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3674 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3675 -->펀디드 상품 전체에 대해서는 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3677 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3678 -->천만 원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3680 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3681 -->부동산 상품에 대해서는 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3683 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3684 -->천만 원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3686 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3687 -->동일대출자 상품에 대해서는 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3689 --> 5<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3690 -->백만 원 투자 가능합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3692 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3694 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3695 -->이 이상으로 투자하기 위해서는 추가<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3697 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3698 -->요건을 갖추고 증빙서류를 펀디드에 제출하면 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3700 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 3705 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3709 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3714 -->개인으로 회원가입 후 증빙서류를 제출하면<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3716 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 3718 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 3719 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3721 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3725 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자는 펀디드를 통해 대출받는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3727 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 3729 -->동일 대출자에 대해<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3731 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3732 -->천만원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3734 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3735 -->펀디드 상품 전체에 대해서는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3737 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3738 -->최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3740 --> 4<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3741 -->천만원까지<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3743 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3744 -->투자원금 잔액 기준<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3746 -->) <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3747 -->투자 가능<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 3748 -->합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3750 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 3755 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3758 -->요건은 두 가지 중<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3761 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></b></span><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3764 -->하나 이상<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3766 -->을 충족하면 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3768 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3772 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3774 -->이자<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3776 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3777 -->배당소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3779 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3780 -->천만 원 초과 or 2)<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3782 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3784 -->사업<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3786 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3787 -->근로소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3789 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3790 -->억 원 초과<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 3794 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3797 -->증빙서류<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3799 --> :&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3802 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3805 -->직전과세기간<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3807 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3808 -->종합소득세 과세표준 확정신고서<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3810 --> + <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3811 -->종합소득세 신고서 접수증<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3813 -->) &nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3815 -->or<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3817 -->&nbsp;(<!-- /react-text --></span><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3820 -->근로소득 원천징수영수증<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3822 -->)<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3827 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3829 -->이자<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3831 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3832 -->배당소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3834 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3835 -->천만원 초과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3837 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 3839 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 3841 -->종합소득 과세표준 확정신고서의<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3843 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3844 -->이자소득금액과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3846 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3847 -->배당소득금액의 합 기준<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3849 -->)<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3853 -->2) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3855 -->사업소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3857 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3858 -->억원 초과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3860 --> (<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3861 -->종합소득 과세표준 확정신고서의 사업소득명세서<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3863 --> - <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3864 -->소득금액 기준<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3866 -->)<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3870 -->3) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3872 -->근로소득<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3874 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3875 -->억원 초과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3877 --> (<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3878 -->근로소득 원천징수영수증의 근로소득금액 기준<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3880 -->)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 3885 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3888 -->종합소득세 신고서 발급은<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3890 --> 1) <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3891 -->국세청 홈택스 홈페이지<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3893 --> 2)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3894 -->세무대리인을 통해서 할 수 있습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3896 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US"><a href="https://www.hometax.go.kr/" target="_blank"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3903 -->국세청<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3906 --> <!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3909 -->홈택스<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3912 --> <!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3915 -->바로가기<!-- /react-text --></span></span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3917 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3921 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3923 -->신고<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3925 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3926 -->납부<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3928 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3929 -->세금신고<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3931 -->/<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3932 -->종합소득세<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3934 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3935 -->신고내역<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3937 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3938 -->신고서보기<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3940 --> &gt; <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3941 -->종합소득세 과세표준 확정신고서 출력<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3943 -->)<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 3948 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3952 -->개인 전문투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3957 -->개인으로 회원가입 후 증빙서류를 제출하면<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3959 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 3961 -->개인 전문투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 3962 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3964 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3965 -->개인 전문투자자는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3967 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 3969 -->금액 제한 없이 펀디드 상품에 자유롭게 투자 가능<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 3970 -->합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3972 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 3977 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3980 -->금융투자협회 지정 전문투자자는 다음의<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3982 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3985 -->세 가지 요건 모두<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3987 -->를 충족해야 합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3989 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3993 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 3995 -->신청일 직전 영업일 기준 금융투자상품 잔고<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 3997 --> 5<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 3998 -->억 원 이상<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4003 -->2) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4005 -->직전 년도의 연소득이<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4007 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4008 -->억 원 이상이거나 제출일 직전 영업일 기준 재산가액<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4010 --> 10<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4011 -->억 원 이상<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4016 -->3) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4018 -->금융투자회사에서 계좌를 개설한 날로부터<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4020 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4021 -->년 이상 경과<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 4027 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4030 -->증빙서류<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4032 --> :&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><!-- react-text: 4035 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4038 -->금융투자협회 전문투자자 확인증<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4040 -->)<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4049 -->신청은<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4051 --> <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 굴림; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4053 -->금융투자협회<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4063 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.kofia.or.kr/wpge/m_175/sub041201.do" target="_blank"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 굴림; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4069 -->금융투자협회<!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4072 --> <!-- /react-text --></span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 굴림; color: rgb(0, 195, 189); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4075 -->바로가기<!-- /react-text --></span></span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: &quot;noto sans demilight&quot;, serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4077 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><br>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4083 -->법인 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4086 -->법인회원 가입 후 증빙서류를 제출하면<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4088 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 4090 -->법인투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 4091 -->가 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4093 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4094 -->법인투자자는<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4097 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4098 -->금액 제한 없이 펀디드 상품에 자유롭게 투자 가능<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 4099 -->합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4101 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 4106 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4109 -->증빙서류<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4114 -->1) <!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4116 -->사업자등록증 및 법인통장 사본<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4119 -->2)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 4121 -->법인인감증명서<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4126 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 4128 -->담당자 서류<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 4134 -->,&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 4136 -->위임장<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 4138 -->,&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 14.6667px; letter-spacing: 0.8px;"><!-- react-text: 4140 -->신분증 사본<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);                               </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4149 -->4)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4151 -->(<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4153 -->대부업 법인의 경우<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4155 -->)&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4156 -->대부업등록증 사본<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 4160 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4162 -->*<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4164 -->법인 대표가 직접 담당하는 경우<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4166 --> 3)<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4167 -->을<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4169 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 4171 -->법인등기부등본<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 4172 -->으로 대체 가능하며<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4174 -->, 4)<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4175 -->는<!-- /react-text --><b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4178 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4179 -->대표자 신분증 사본<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 4180 -->만 보내주시면 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4182 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span></span><br>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 4187 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4191 -->투자자 유형 변경 신청<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial;                               </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><span lang="EN-US"><o:p><br></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 3.75pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 29.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 21pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4238 -->Q&amp;A&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4240 -->가이드라인 시행과 관련하여 투자자 분들이 헷갈려 하시는 부분에 대해 답변을 드립니다<!-- /react-text --></span><span lang="EN-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4242 -->.<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4246 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4248 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4252 -->투자한도가 계산되는 기준이 무엇인가요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4254 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4259 -->투자한도는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4261 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 4263 -->투자중인 원금 잔액<!-- /react-text --></b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4265 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4266 -->기준으로 일반 투자자에게<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4268 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4269 -->천만원<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4271 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4272 -->소득요건을 구비한 개인투자자에게<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4274 --> 4<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4275 -->천만원입니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4277 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 4282 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4284 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4288 -->한도를 다 채워서 투자하였습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4290 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4291 -->상환 받은 금액을 다시 투자할 수 있나요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4293 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4298 -->투자한 원금을 상환받으면 그만큼 투자한도가 다시 생기는 원리이므로<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4300 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4301 -->투자 가능합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4303 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4308 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4310 -->는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4312 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4313 -->펀디드에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4315 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4316 -->천만 원 이하<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4318 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4319 -->부동산에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4321 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4322 -->천만 원 이하<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4324 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4325 -->하나의 대출자에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4327 --> 5<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4328 -->백만 원 이하라는 조건 하에서 자유롭게 재투자할 수 있습니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4330 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4335 -->소득요건을 구비한 투자자<!-- /react-text --></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4337 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4339 -->역시 동일하게 펀디드에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4341 --> 4<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4342 -->천만 원 이하<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4344 -->, <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4345 -->하나의 대출자에 투자중인 원금<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4347 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4348 -->천만 원 이하라는 조건 하에서 재투자가 가능합니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4350 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 4355 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4357 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4361 -->대부업 개인사업자는 어떻게 분류가 되나요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4363 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4368 -->대부업 개인사업자는 기본적으로<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4370 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 4372 -->일반 투자자<!-- /react-text --></b><!-- react-text: 4373 -->로 분류됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4375 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4376 -->기타 요건을 갖추었을 경우 펀디드에 자료를 제출해주시면 투자자 유형을 변경해드립니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4378 -->.<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p><!-- react-text: 4383 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></o:p></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4385 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 21.5pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><b><span style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(22, 176, 109); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4389 -->펀디드 포인트도 투자한도에 포함이 되나요<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4391 -->?<!-- /react-text --></span></span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"></p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 1.5pt 0cm 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4397 -->1P<!-- /react-text --></span><span style="font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><!-- react-text: 4399 -->가<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4401 --> 1<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4402 -->원의 가치를 지니고 있는 펀디드 포인트도 투자한도에 포함이 됩니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4404 -->. <!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4405 -->일반 투자자는<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4407 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><b><!-- react-text: 4409 -->포인트를<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4411 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4412 -->포함하여<!-- /react-text --></b><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4414 -->&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4415 -->펀디드에 투자할 수 있는 금액이 최대<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4417 --> 2<!-- /react-text --></span><!-- react-text: 4418 -->천만 원입니다<!-- /react-text --><span lang="EN-US"><!-- react-text: 4420 -->.&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><o:p></o:p></span></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><br></span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: 22pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; word-break: keep-all;"><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;"><br></span>
                              </p>

                        <h4 class="panel-title">
                          <a>
                            <span class="header-number">89</span>
                            <span class="header-title">[이벤트] 거짓말 같은 만우절 이벤트! (종료)</span>
                            <span class="header-created">2020-03-30</span>
                            <span class="header-collapse"></span>
                          </a>
                        </h4>
                      </div>
                      <div class="ReactCollapse--collapse" style="overflow: hidden; height: 0px;">
                        <div class="ReactCollapse--content">
                          <div class="panel-body">
                            <div class="body-title">
                              <span class="title">[이벤트] 거짓말 같은 만우절 이벤트! (종료)</span>
                              <span class="created">2020-03-30</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="body-contents">
                              <p><a href="https://funded.co.kr/investment"><img data-savepage-src="https://cocktailmkt.s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/bear/%EC%9C%A0%EB%8F%99%ED%99%94/%ED%8E%80%EB%94%94%EB%93%9C/%ED%8E%80%EB%94%94%EB%93%9C_%ED%99%88%ED%8E%98%EC%9D%B4%EC%A7%80%EA%B3%B5%EC%A7%80%EC%82%AC%ED%95%AD_%EB%A7%8C%EC%9A%B0%EC%A0%88_0330.png" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100%;"></a>
                              </p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 10044 -->2020.04.01 ~ 2020.04.10 까지&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --><span style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><br></span></font><span style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0);"><span style="font-weight: 700;"><!-- react-text: 10049 -->거짓말 같은 만우절 이벤트&nbsp;<!-- /react-text --></span></span>
                                <!-- react-text: 10050 -->를 진행합니다!
                                <!-- /react-text -->
                              </p>
                              <hr>
                              <p style="font-family: &quot;nanum square&quot;, &quot;helvetica neue&quot;, roboto, arial, &quot;droid sans&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><span style="font-weight: 700; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0);"><!-- react-text: 10056 -->이벤트 내용<!-- /react-text --></span></font></font>
                              </p>
                              <p></p>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 10060 -->04.01 ~ 04.10에 오픈 한 상품에 한해<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 10063 -->투자 금액에 따라 포인트 리워드 증정!<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <p></p>
                              <p></p>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 10068 -->- 100 만원 투자하면 1 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 10071 -->- 200 만원 투자하면 2 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 10074 -->- 300 만원 투자하면 3 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 10077 -->- 400 만원 투자하면 4 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 10080 -->- 500 만원 투자하면 5 %<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><br>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 10085 -->* 본 이벤트는 각 상품당 개별로 적용됩니다.<!-- /react-text --><br><br></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 10090 -->ex)295 상품에 500 만원, 295-2상품에 500 만원 투자했다면<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 10093 -->295 상품 리워드로 25 만 point / 295-2 리워드로 25 만 point<!-- /react-text --></font>
                              </div>
                              <hr>
                              <div><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 10100 -->이벤트 참여 유의 사항<!-- /react-text --></font></font>
                                  </p>
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 10106 -->- 본 이벤트는 펀디드 모든 회원을 대상으로 진행됩니다.<!-- /react-text --><br></font></font></font></font>
                                    <!-- react-text: 10108 -->- 포인트 지급은 상품 기표날을 기준으로 지급되며, 오직 투자에만 사용 가능합니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br>
                                    <!-- react-text: 10110 -->- 본 이벤트는 예산 소진 시 조기 마감될 수 있습니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br>
                                    <!-- react-text: 10112 -->- 이벤트 상품은 4월1일부터 진행됩니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br><br><br>
                                  </p>
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 10119 -->다음과 같은 경우 이벤트 참여가 취소 될 수 있습니다.<!-- /react-text --></font></font>
                                  </p>
                                  <p><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><!-- react-text: 10125 -->- 상품 대출 취소 시 이벤트 참여가 취소됩니다.<!-- /react-text --><br></font></font></font></font>
                                    <!-- react-text: 10127 -->- 투자 취소 시 이벤트 참여가 취소됩니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text --><br>
                                    <!-- react-text: 10129 -->- 정당하지 않은 방법으로 참여할 경우, 이벤트 참여가 취소됩니다.
                                    <!-- /react-text -->
                                  </p></font>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="panel">

                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 10150 -->신한은행 연계시스템 오류로 인하여&nbsp; 인해 입,출금 등의 업무가 진행되지 않고 있습니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 10153 -->불편 끼쳐 드려 죄송합니다.&nbsp;
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 10157 -->금일&nbsp; 점검 작업 중에 있으며, 이로 인하여 사이트 접속이 원활하지 않을 수 있습니다. 
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 10159 -->최대한 빠른 시간 내 처리할 예정이오니&nbsp; 이점 양해 부탁 드리겠습니다.&nbsp;
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>

                                <!-- react-text: 10848 -->안녕하세요 펀디드입니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p><br>
                              </p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 10852 -->신한은행 연계시스템의 점검작업으로 인해 입,출금 등의 업무가 진행되지 않고 있습니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p>

                                <!-- react-text: 10858 -->금일&nbsp; 갱신작업을 진행하고 있으며, 최대한 빨리 처리 하겠습니다.
                                <!-- /react-text --></p>
                              <p>
                                <!-- react-text: 10860 -->이점 양해 부탁 드리겠습니다.&nbsp;

                              <p><br>
